actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to repeal (with respect to individuals who have not yet attained age 65) the provisions which presently provide higher old-age insurance benefits for individuals who delay their retirement.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to repeal those provisions which provide increased old age insurance benefits for individuals who delay retirement until after attainment of age 65.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to repeal (with respect to individuals who have not yet attained age 65) the provisions which presently provide higher old-age insurance benefits for individuals who delay their retirement.
